title: 2021 GIS User Survey
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Contents Introduction Respondent Information Office Location Current Software Usage and Issues Software Usage GIS Availability GIS Add-Ons Node Future Wants and Needs More Tools and Software Resources Hangout Topics Miscellaneous Comments Introduction Respondent Information Office Location Current Software Usage and Issues Software Usage GIS Availability GIS Add-Ons {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","caption":"Are there any other Esri or third-party GIS add-on tools you wish you had access to (i.e. Esri's Business Analyst)? (N=0)","data":[["Definitely want to have access to ETGEo","I think only access to ArcGIS online","Not right now","I think Business Analyst would be handy. I would really like to have a better understanding of which tools are available to us via ArcGIS Online, particularly the ones that we could be using for interactive maps and online engagement.","Integration of Adobe Illustrator and ArcGIS","Business Analyst would be great for many multimodal or mobility hub projects.","ESRI Business Analyst for employment data","None that I am aware of."]],"container":"
Response
","options":{"paging":false,"info":false,"autoWidth":true,"order":[],"orderClasses":false,"orderCellsTop":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Node {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","caption":"Any other requests or comments about Node? (N=0)","data":[["WOuld be nice if I didn't have to enter my password to get into Node","None","Node works great for me! I actually prefer it to using ArcGIS on my desktop.","It would be great if the same Node was connected to each time so Quick access folders remained the same, but other than that Node works great!","I know that we weren't able to get R packages installed across all nodes, but I've been using R quite a bit on node and rarely had any issues. Sometimes I need to install packages but I think it often gives me the same node so it's not an issue. Works better than expected! The biggest issue I have with node is being able to access sharepoint. Is there a work around for this?","Always works quite well for me!","When I log out and log back in, my quick access folders aren’t there anymore. It would be awesome if that worked. I love that node is fast.","It is unclear what causes some delay and sluggishness, but the mid-year IT change for near-instant saving across servers was very helpful. I find it frustrating when settings change based on the instance that Node connects to.","Is Node going to be the default method of using GIS even after returning to offices?","Wish it had Adobe (Illustrator and InDesign) on Node. InDesign can get slow without local server."]],"container":"
Response
","options":{"paging":false,"info":false,"autoWidth":true,"order":[],"orderClasses":false,"orderCellsTop":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Future Wants and Needs More Tools and Software {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","caption":"Are there any tools we should develop in GIS, R, Illustrator or InDesign? (N=0)","data":[["One that can be big for the firm is to start developing a Route Profile Dashboard using APC and R shiny","Tools regarding above","It might be nice to develop some tools that automate some aspects of a standard crash data cleanup and analysis, but I don't have any specific ideas.","A dashboard with APC and or AVL data out into standardized format would be great.","PLEASE PLEASE help finish the development of the shared parking model as an R Shiny app so we can deploy it for projects and make it fully interactive online.","None that I am aware of."]],"container":"
Response
","options":{"paging":false,"info":false,"autoWidth":true,"order":[],"orderClasses":false,"orderCellsTop":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","caption":"Are there any tools/data you would like us to explore and investigate? (N=0)","data":[["Curious about using Mapbox instead of ESRI Storymaps.","Nothing comes to mind right now!","Lately I have come across a few instances where I need some extra leaflet functionality or add-ons that are not a part of the regular R leaflet or leaflet.extras packages, but they are available as extra leaflet javascript libraries. I've read about a way to install javascript packages for use in R but have yet to have any success. If this is something Bryan is interested in looking into I think it could be really helpful to extend our Shiny functionality to more closely match what's available through regular javascript web development.","An alternative to Google maps API for travel time would be great.","Strava (or equivalent) data for bike demand","None that I am aware of."]],"container":"
Response
","options":{"paging":false,"info":false,"autoWidth":true,"order":[],"orderClasses":false,"orderCellsTop":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Resources {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","caption":"Are there any GIS/cartography/R resources we should develop (how to guides, style reference, one-pager about data, training, etc.)? (N=0)","data":[["I'd love the opportunity to learn how to style maps and data outputs using Leaflet, D3, or R. (More of a personal goal than a request per se.)","Yes, and I think we can develop three basic how two if there is enough people that find it interesting/useful. I might be able to help drafting some of them: - How to generate OD lines (spider map) using R - How to retrieve LEHD data and Census data using R LODES and tidycensus packages - How to generate shapes and stop geometry's using GTFS","R how to guides on handling LEHD and census data, as well as anything working with GTFS to determine average frequencies/spans","I'd like us to get better about documenting GIS and R analysis methods and cataloguing them. I don't know how consistently most people write methodology memos, or even take notes. I'd like some of the best ones to be stored on the G drive so, for example, if I want to do a similar transit market analysis to what Suzie has done in Boston, I can easily find detailed documentation of it.","Some how to guides for how to work across ArcMap -> R -> Illustrator would be helpful. I've found the workflow of creating maps and/or graphics in R and exporting to an svg so they can be used in illustrator has been really nice, for example. I used this workflow with Layne on COIC Redmond and it worked well. There are some tips and tricks to help, like keeping the map extent constant if generating a series, that are not always obvious. I think some simple how-to's or catalogues of code snippets for R would be helpful. I'm thinking especially of things that should be quick but can take too long to remember how to do if you don't do them often, like how to create a palette to use with R Leaflet or certain ggplot options. If more folks are going to continue using Shiny, I think some basic css/html training could be useful","Continue to update and add to G:\Data","Written how to guides based on tips and tricks shared during GIS/Vizcomm hangouts. For example, something to reference with regards to the best GIS-to-Illustrator workflow.","It would be great to have a checklist for associates submitting maps for review. I get a lot of maps with obvious errors like no north arrow, scale bar, typos, etc. I think a checklist would help associates walk through their work before submitting. Happy to help with this.","There are some great how-tos and analysis process guides, I would say keep them coming to have standardized approaches","how-to guide for hexbins, style reference for basemaps, help on getting Canadian data sources","None that I am aware of.","ArcGIS Pro guides"]],"container":"
Response
","options":{"paging":false,"info":false,"autoWidth":true,"order":[],"orderClasses":false,"orderCellsTop":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Hangout Topics {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","caption":"Are there any topics we should cover at Hangout? (N=0)","data":[["Tools/apps that we can use with our ArcGIS Online accounts; crash analysis","I've had to miss the last few but have really enjoyed them in the past. I'm not sure I have suggestions other than keep up the good work and continue to include interesting project demos.","N/A","NN GIS 101, especially file saving protocol"]],"container":"
Response
","options":{"paging":false,"info":false,"autoWidth":true,"order":[],"orderClasses":false,"orderCellsTop":true}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Miscellaneous Comments {"x":{"filter":"top","filterHTML":"
","caption":"Any other comments / requests? (N=0)","data":[["Keep up the good work! I'm really excited for the joint GIS and R team!","I work in Illustrator outside of the Node. For files saved on the G Drive, it takes a very long time to save the document. Not sure if others experience this or if this is just due to WFH, but thought I'd mention it here.","Nearmap is awesome."]],"container":"
